sub_title: Energetic and experienced sales manager who guides you through the new age of Digital Transformation. I'll help you to find the answers on why change and why now.
summary:
Positive, energetic and results-driven Sales Manager. with 25+ years international experience in Information Technology and In software sales. Working in a fast moving environment, I translate business ideas and questions to software solutions which add value. 

Experienced  in doing business across the globe (EU, APAC and USA) for customers in Industrial Manufacturing, Food & Beverage, Oil & Gas, Infra & Utilities and distribution markets

Skills include:
Sales Management, Account Management, Solution Selling, Consultative Selling, Strategic Account Planning, Marketing, Business Development, Partnership Building, Team Building/ Coaching, Business Visioning and Strategy

Specialties: Solution Management, Cloud Computing, BI, SaaS, EAM, ERP (Microsoft  Infor , SAP), TSM, WMS, MES, CRM, PLM and OEE.
